short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A study guide for the CompTIA A+ exam with videos and quizzes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides access to a curated collection of instructional videos and practice quizzes designed to cover every aspect of the CompTIA A+ exam.
